mapper.select: select l.Apply_No as applyNo, l.Apply_Date as applyDate, m.Mem_No as memNo, m.ID as id, m.Name as name, b.TiTle as title, l.Apply_Status_Code as applyStatusCode, b.ISBN as isbn, pl.Rental_Status as rentalStatus, pl.Reg_Code as regCode from LEND l, MEMBER m, PERSONAL_LIBRARY pl, BOOK b where pl.Mem_No=#{memNo} and pl.Reg_Code='1' and pl.Pers_Book_No = l.Pers_Book_No and pl.ISBN = b.ISBN and m.Mem_no=l.Mem_no order by Apply_Status_Code, Apply_Date DESC limit #{pageStartIndex}, #{pageSize}
select count(x.Apply_No) from ( select l.Apply_No from LEND l, MEMBER m, PERSONAL_LIBRARY pl where pl.Reg_Code='1' and pl.Pers_Book_No = l.Pers_Book_No and m.Mem_no=l.Mem_no and pl.Mem_No=#{memNo} )x

select l.Assign_Date as assignDate, m.Name as name, m.ID as id, b.TiTle as title, d.Del_Code as delCode, d.Apply_No as applyNo, pl.Reg_Code as regCode from LEND l, DELIVERY d, PERSONAL_LIBRARY pl, MEMBER m, BOOK b where pl.Mem_No=#{memNo} and pl.Reg_Code='1' and pl.Pers_Book_No=l.Pers_Book_No and l.Apply_No=d.Apply_No and l.Mem_No=m.Mem_No and d.Del_Code IN ('1', '2') and pl.ISBN=b.ISBN order by d.Del_Code, l.Assign_Date DESC limit #{pageStartIndex}, #{pageSize}

select count(x.Del_No) from ( select d.Del_No from LEND l, DELIVERY d, PERSONAL_LIBRARY pl, MEMBER m where pl.Mem_No=#{memNo} and pl.Reg_Code='1' and pl.Pers_Book_No=l.Pers_Book_No and l.Apply_No=d.Apply_No and l.Mem_No=m.Mem_No and d.Del_Code IN ('1', '2') )x

select d.Apply_No as applyNo, d.Rec_Date as recDate, m.ID as id, m.Name as name, b.TiTle as title, d.Del_Code as delCode, pl.Reg_Code as regCode from LEND l, DELIVERY d, MEMBER m, PERSONAL_LIBRARY pl, BOOK b where pl.Mem_No=#{memNo} and pl.Reg_Code='1' and pl.Pers_Book_No=l.Pers_Book_No and l.Apply_No=d.Apply_No and d.Del_Code IN ('3','4','5') and pl.ISBN=b.ISBN and l.Mem_No=m.Mem_No order by Rec_Date DESC limit #{pageStartIndex}, #{pageSize}

select count(x.Del_No) from ( select d.Del_No from LEND l, DELIVERY d, MEMBER m, PERSONAL_LIBRARY pl where pl.Mem_No=#{memNo} and pl.Reg_Code='1' and pl.Pers_Book_No=l.Pers_Book_No and l.Apply_No=d.Apply_No and d.Del_Code IN ('3','4','5') and l.Mem_No=m.Mem_No )x
mapper.update: update PERSONAL_LIBRARY set Rental_Status = '1' where Pers_Book_No = ( select l.Pers_Book_No from LEND l where l.Apply_No = #{applyNo} );
